item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 28, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Getting hit by lightning is good for some tropical trees (49 points | 8 comments)
2. Preschoolers can reason better than we think, study suggests (115 points | 70 comments)
3. Cross-Platform P2P Wi-Fi: How the EU Killed AWDL (46 points | 11 comments)
4. The Biology of B-Movie Monsters (2003) (20 points | 12 comments)
5. Decomposing a Factorial into Large Factors (4 points | discuss)
6. Architecture Patterns with Python (291 points | 63 comments)
7. How to Write Blog Posts That Developers Read · Refactoring English (56 points | 26 comments)
8. I asked police to send me their public surveillance footage of my car (290 points | 194 comments)
9. MilliForth-6502: The smallest Forth real programming language for 6502 (44 points | 1 comment)
10. Despite Ukraine War, Europe Imported Even More Russian Gas Last Year (31 points | 26 comments)
11. Giant, fungus-like organism may be a completely unknown branch of life (214 points | 85 comments)
12. PermitFlow (YC W22) Is Hiring Senior/Staff Engineers in NYC ( | hide)
13. The Biology of a Large Language Model (5 points | discuss)
14. Things I would have told myself before building an autorouter (282 points | 66 comments)
15. How to Use Em Dashes (–), En Dashes (–), and Hyphens (-) (493 points | 369 comments)
16. Tracing the thoughts of a large language model (863 points | 300 comments)
17. A note on the USB-to-PS/2 mouse adapter that came with Microsoft mouse devices (298 points | 81 comments)
18. Let's Take a Look at JEP 483: Ahead-of-Time Class Loading and Linking (24 points | 11 comments)
19. Japanese scientists create new plastic that dissolves in saltwater overnight (17 points | 2 comments)
20. The Great Chatbot Debate – March 25th (6 points | 1 comment)
21. Entropy Attacks (39 points | 9 comments)
22. I tried making artificial sunlight at home (461 points | 205 comments)
23. 7.7 magnitude earthquake hits Southeast Asia, affecting Myanmar and Thailand (157 points | 54 comments)
24. How I Choose What to Work On (2023) (71 points | 20 comments)
25. Every Flop Counts: Scaling a 300B LLM Without Premium GPUs (95 points | 4 comments)
26. Golang on the Playstation 2 (175 points | 9 comments)
27. I genuinely don't understand why some people are still bullish about LLMs (576 points | 991 comments)
28. Abundance isn't going to happen unless politicians are scared of the status quo (300 points | 433 comments)
29. Estimating Camera Motion from a Single Motion-Blurred Image (53 points | 18 comments)
30. Mid-pregnancy pollution exposure linked to postpartum depression (45 points | 7 comments)
